short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track how much time you spend on websites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use Zen Screen Time to be mindful about the time you spend on each website in your browser. Visualize your daily usage in a chart with a website-level breakdown.
